issue.title: [Integration][Java] Integration tests for Map type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1279](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1279). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1279?focusedCommentId=16151973) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I attached some child JIRAs that must be completed for this to be possible. Since Map is a logical type for a list of structs, the IPC / JSON read/write will simply have to dispatch to the List code path

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1279?focusedCommentId=16867846) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
I'll take this unless `[~bkietz]` was already working on it?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1279?focusedCommentId=16867904) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
`[~bryanc]` go for it

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1279?focusedCommentId=16872595) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
Moved to 0.14.0 as it would be good to get in the release since we have already added MapType for C++ and Java. This is not a blocker though.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1279?focusedCommentId=16873886) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4684
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4684>
